thread.title: Hawker cheated of RM100k over foreign worker permits
thread.title_full: Hawker cheated of RM100k over foreign worker permits

title: Hawker cheated of RM100k over foreign worker permits
text:
More 
A food hawker's attempts to secure work permits for his foreign workers turned into a nightmare when he was slapped with an Immigration Department fine of RM100,000. 
Pang Yee Weh said he had been cheated of about the same amount when he tried to engage two agents to secure work permits for his 14 workers. 
"I tried to get them permits, I tried to do whatever I could so they would have permits. 
"Finally, I lost RM100,000 and my workers are arrested," he told Malaysiakini . 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
